comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Charles Dalmorès (January 1, 1871 – December 6, 1939) was a French tenor. He enjoyed an international operatic career, singing to public and critical acclaim on both sides of the Atlantic during the first two decades of the 20th century. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Dalmor%C3%A8s
